fields.name: trip_id
fields.title: Trip ID
fields.description: The trip_id field contains an ID that identifies a trip.

fields.name: arrival_time
fields.title: Arrival time
fields.description: The arrival_time specifies the arrival time at a specific stop for a specific trip on a route. HH:MM:SS

fields.name: departure_time
fields.title: Departure time
fields.description: The departure_time specifies the departure time from a specific stop for a specific trip on a route. HH:MM:SS

fields.name: stop_id
fields.title: Stop ID
fields.description: The stop_id field contains an ID that uniquely identifies a stop.

fields.name: stop_sequence
fields.title: Stop sequence
fields.description: The stop_sequence field identifies the order of the stops for a particular trip. The values for stop_sequence must be non-negative integers

fields.name: stop_headsign
fields.title: Stop headsign
fields.description: The stop_headsign field contains the text that appears on a sign that identifies the trip's destination to passengers.

fields.name: pickup_type
fields.title: Pickup type
fields.description: The pickup_type field indicates whether passengers are picked up at a stop as part of the normal schedule or whether a pickup at the stop is not available.

fields.name: drop_off_type
fields.title: Drop off type
fields.description: The drop_off_type field indicates whether passengers are dropped off at a stop as part of the normal schedule or whether a drop off at the stop is not available.

fields.name: shape_dist_traveled
fields.title: Drop off type
fields.description: When used in the stop_times.txt file, the shape_dist_traveled field positions a stop as a distance from the first shape point.

fields.name: timepoint
fields.title: Timepoint
fields.description: The timepoint field can be used to indicate if the specified arrival and departure times for a stop are strictly adhered to by the transit vehicle or if they are instead approximate and/or interpolated times.
